metadata.title: CVE-2024-38473 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Encoding problem in mod_proxy in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 and earlierallows request URLs with incorrect encoding to be sent to backend services,potentially bypassing authentication via crafted requests.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.60, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
